resources.string:
Hi, I am Elena! 

I am a Kundalini Yoga teacher. I have been doing yoga for 11 years and teaching for 7 years. Yoga for me is more than a profession and a hobby. She became a part of me, my life. 

By education, I am a manager of an organization in the field of tourism, and also a physical education teacher. 

 I love reading, I prefer classical literature. My favorite writers are V. Hugo, A. Dyuma, M. Dostoevsky, G. Hesse. And from modern writers I like to read D. Rubina, G. Yakhina, E. Gilbert. 

 For a year now I have been fond of mobile development. This is a very exciting activity for me. Difficult, but insanely interesting.
